itemdata.desc: Active: Blink - Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.  If damage is taken, Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3.0 seconds.
itemdata.notes: Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.If you used Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.
itemdata.lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.

itemdata.attrib: + 9 Damage
itemdata.lore: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.

itemdata.attrib: + 18 Damage
itemdata.lore: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.

itemdata.attrib: + 5 Armor
itemdata.lore: A medium weave of metal chains.

itemdata.attrib: + 21 Damage
itemdata.lore: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.

itemdata.attrib:
+ 5 Armor
+ 3 HP Regeneration
itemdata.lore: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.

itemdata.desc: Passive: Pierce - Grants each attack a chance to deal bonus damage.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 21 Damage
CHANCE TO PIERCE: 20%
PIERCE DAMAGE: 40
itemdata.lore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.

itemdata.attrib: + 24 Damage
itemdata.lore: A hammer forged of pure mithril.

itemdata.attrib: + 10 Armor
itemdata.lore: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.

itemdata.attrib:
+ 10 Damage
+ 10 Attack Speed
itemdata.lore: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

itemdata.desc:
Active: Chop Tree/Ward - Destroy a target tree or ward. Chop cast range is increased when targetting wards.
Passive: Quell - Increases attack damage against non-hero units, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee. Does not provide bonus damage against Roshan.
itemdata.notes: Cannot carry more than one.
itemdata.attrib:
QUELL MELEE DAMAGE: 140%
QUELL RANGED DAMAGE: 115%
CHOP TREE CAST RANGE: 350
CHOP WARD CAST RANGE: 450
itemdata.lore: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.

itemdata.attrib: + 3 Armor
itemdata.lore: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.

itemdata.desc: Passive: Damage Block - Gives a chance to block damage based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
itemdata.notes: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
itemdata.attrib:
MELEE DAMAGE BLOCK: 16
RANGED DAMAGE BLOCK: 8
BLOCK CHANCE: 50%
itemdata.lore: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.

itemdata.desc:
Use: Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain 60 attack speed. Does not stack.
Passive: Shade Sight - Grants 250 bonus night vision.
itemdata.notes: The bonus night vision works during Night Stalker's Darkness ability.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 120 Attack Speed
SHADE BONUS NIGHT VISION: 250
CONSUME ATTACK SPEED: 60
itemdata.lore: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.

itemdata.attrib: + 3 Strength
itemdata.lore: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.

itemdata.attrib: + 3 Agility
itemdata.lore: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.

itemdata.attrib: + 3 Intelligence
itemdata.lore: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.

itemdata.attrib: + 1 All Attributes
itemdata.lore: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

itemdata.attrib: + 6 Strength
itemdata.lore: A valued accessory for improving vitality.

itemdata.attrib: + 6 Agility
itemdata.lore: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.

itemdata.attrib: + 6 Intelligence
itemdata.lore: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.

itemdata.attrib: + 2 All Attributes
itemdata.lore: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.

itemdata.attrib: + 10 Strength
itemdata.lore: You grow stronger just by holding it.

itemdata.attrib: + 10 Agility
itemdata.lore: A long blade imbued with time magic.

itemdata.attrib: + 10 Intelligence
itemdata.lore: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.

itemdata.attrib: + 10 All Attributes
itemdata.lore: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.

itemdata.attrib: + 20 Attack Speed
itemdata.lore: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.

itemdata.desc:
Passive: Lifesteal - Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.

Morbid Mask is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
itemdata.attrib: LIFESTEAL: 15%
itemdata.lore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.

itemdata.notes: Ring of Regen is shareable.
itemdata.attrib: + 2 HP Regeneration
itemdata.lore: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.

itemdata.notes: Sage's Mask is shareable.
itemdata.attrib: + 50% Mana Regeneration
itemdata.lore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

itemdata.desc: Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
itemdata.attrib: + 50 Movement Speed
itemdata.lore: Fleet footwear, increasing movement.

itemdata.desc:
Passive: True Sight - Adds the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within its carrier's range.
Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.
itemdata.notes: Disabled while on a courier.
itemdata.attrib: TRUE SIGHT RADIUS: 1100
itemdata.lore:
Not one thrall creature of the depths,
Nor spirit bound in drowning's keep,
Nor Maelrawn the Tentacular,
Shall rest till seas, gem comes to sleep.

itemdata.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
itemdata.attrib: + 20% Spell Resistance
itemdata.lore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.

itemdata.desc: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
itemdata.attrib: + 25% Evasion
itemdata.lore: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.

itemdata.desc: Use: Consume to instantly restore health and mana.
itemdata.notes: Cheese is shareable.
itemdata.attrib:
HEALTH RESTORED: 2500
MANA RESTORED: 1000
itemdata.lore: Made from the milk of a long lost Furbolg vendor, it restores the vitality of those who taste it.

itemdata.desc: Active: Energy Charge - Instantly restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored. Gains a charge (max 10) whenever a nearby visible enemy uses an ability.
itemdata.notes: Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
itemdata.attrib: HEALTH/MANA PER CHARGE: 15
itemdata.lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

itemdata.desc: Active: Energy Charge - Instantly restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored. Gains a charge (max 17) whenever a nearby visible enemy uses an ability.
itemdata.notes: Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 4 All Attributes
HEALTH/MANA PER CHARGE: 15
itemdata.lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

itemdata.desc:
Active: Ghost Form - Enter ghost form, becoming immune to physical damage, yet unable to attack and taking 40% extra magic damage.
Using a Town Portal Scroll or Boots of Travel  will not dispel Ghost Form.
itemdata.notes: Ends if you become Spell Immune, and will have no effect if you are already Spell Immune.Shares cooldown with Ethereal Blade.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 5 All Attributes
GHOST DURATION: 4
GHOST ADDED MAGIC DAMAGE: 40%
itemdata.lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.

itemdata.desc: Use: Restores mana to the target unit over time.  If the unit is attacked, the effect is lost.
itemdata.attrib:
TOTAL MANA RESTORED: 170
DURATION: 45
itemdata.lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.

itemdata.desc: Use: Consume the mango to instantly restore 150 mana. Can be fed to an ally.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 1 HP Regeneration
MANA RESTORED: 150
itemdata.lore: The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.

itemdata.desc: Use: Restores health to the target unit over time.  If the unit is attacked, the effect is lost.
itemdata.attrib:
DURATION: 8
HEALTH RESTORED: 400
itemdata.lore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.

itemdata.desc: Use: Reveals and slows invisible Heroes in a nearby area.
itemdata.notes: Places a buff on enemy units in the area that prevents them from becoming invisible.
itemdata.attrib:
DURATION: 12
RADIUS: 1050
SLOW: 20%

itemdata.desc:
Use: Regenerate - Consumes a charge to restore Health and Mana over time. Healing stops if attacked.  Bottle can be refilled at your team's fountain.  Runes can be stored in the Bottle for later use, and are activated automatically after 2 minutes.  If Bottle does not have full charges and is placed on a courier, the courier will move 30% slower.

Hold Control to use Regenerate on an allied hero.  Stored runes cannot be shared.
itemdata.notes: Bottle is shareable.
itemdata.attrib:
HEALTH RESTORED: 135
MANA RESTORED: 70
DURATION: 3
itemdata.lore: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.

itemdata.desc:
Use: Plants an Observer Ward, an invisible watcher that gives vision of its surrounding area to your team. Lasts 7 minutes.

Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.
itemdata.attrib:
VISION RANGE: 1600
DURATION (MINUTES): 7
itemdata.lore: A form of half-sentient plant, often cultivated by apprentice wizards.

itemdata.desc:
Use: Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within its range. Lasts 4 minutes.

Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.
itemdata.attrib:
TRUE SIGHT RANGE: 850
DURATION (MINUTES): 4
itemdata.lore: A form of plant originally grown in the garden of a fearful king.

itemdata.desc:
Double-Click to switch the currently active ward.

Use: Plant the currently active ward to keep watch over an area. Observer Wards reveal their surrounding area to your team. Sentry Wards grant True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within its range.
itemdata.attrib:
OBSERVER VISION RANGE: 1600
OBSERVER DURATION (MINUTES): 7
SENTRY TRUE SIGHT RANGE: 850
SENTRY DURATION (MINUTES): 4
itemdata.lore: Advancements in stacking efficiency have made wards easier to carry than ever.

itemdata.desc:
Use: Eat a Tree or Ward - Consume a target tree or ward to gradually restore health.

Comes with 4 charges.  Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.
itemdata.attrib:
EAT TREE HEALTH RESTORED: 115
EAT WARD HEALTH RESTORED: 230
EAT WARD CAST RANGE: 450
HEAL DURATION: 16
itemdata.lore: Forage to survive on the battlefield.

itemdata.desc: Use: Eat a Tree or Ward - Consume a target tree or ward to gradually restore health.
itemdata.attrib:
EAT TREE HEALTH RESTORED: 115
EAT WARD HEALTH RESTORED: 230
EAT WARD CAST RANGE: 450
HEAL DURATION: 16
itemdata.lore: Om nom nom.

itemdata.desc: Use: Deploy Courier - Deploys a creature to carry items to and from your team's base.
itemdata.lore: Losing the courier is punishable by death.

itemdata.desc: Use: Teleport - Teleports you to a target friendly building. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.
itemdata.notes: If multiple heroes teleport to the same location in succession, the channeling time will be increased for each successive hero.

itemdata.desc:
Active: Teleport - Teleports you to an allied non-hero unit or structure. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain. Upgradable to allow you to teleport to allied heroes.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
itemdata.notes: Shares cooldown with Town Portal Scrolls.
itemdata.attrib: + 100 Movement Speed
itemdata.lore: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.

itemdata.desc:
Active: Teleport - Teleports you to any allied structure or unit, including heroes. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
itemdata.notes: Shares cooldown with Town Portal Scrolls.
itemdata.attrib: + 100 Movement Speed

itemdata.desc:
Active: Phase - Gives increased movement speed and lets you move through units.  Phase is cancelled upon using another item or ability.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 50 Movement Speed
+ 24 Damage
PHASE MOVE BOOST: 16%
PHASE DURATION: 3.6
itemdata.lore: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.

itemdata.attrib: + 46 Damage
itemdata.lore: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.

itemdata.attrib: + 25 Agility
itemdata.lore: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.

itemdata.attrib: + 25 Strength
itemdata.lore: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.

itemdata.attrib: + 60 Damage
itemdata.lore: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.

itemdata.attrib: + 55 Attack Speed
itemdata.lore: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.

itemdata.notes: Ring of Health is shareable.
itemdata.attrib: + 5 HP Regeneration
itemdata.lore: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.

itemdata.notes: Void Stone is shareable.
itemdata.attrib: + 100% Mana Regeneration
itemdata.lore: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.

itemdata.attrib: + 25 Intelligence
itemdata.lore: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.

itemdata.attrib: + 250 Mana
itemdata.lore: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.

itemdata.attrib:
+ 150 Mana
+ 200 Health
itemdata.lore: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.

itemdata.attrib: + 250 Health
itemdata.lore: A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

itemdata.desc:
Active: Switch Attribute - Changes selected attribute between Strength, Agility and Intelligence.

Power Treads can be built using a Belt of Strength, Band of Elvenskin, or a Robe of the Magi.  Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack, nor does the attack speed bonus from multiple Power Treads.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 50 Movement Speed
+ 9 Selected Attribute
+ 30 Attack Speed
itemdata.lore: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.

itemdata.desc: Active: Transmute - Kills a non-hero target for 190 gold and 2.5x experience.  Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.
itemdata.notes: The gold given is reliable gold (you do not get the normal creep bounty).Experience gained by using Transmute is not shared.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 30 Attack Speed
TRANSMUTE CAST RANGE: 600
itemdata.lore: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.

itemdata.attrib:
+ 6 Intelligence
+ 10 Attack Speed
+ 15 Damage
+ 75% Mana Regeneration
itemdata.lore: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary quarterstaff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.

itemdata.notes: Perseverance is shareable.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 5 HP Regeneration
+ 125% Mana Regeneration
+ 10 Damage
itemdata.lore: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.

itemdata.desc: Passive: Damage Block - Blocks physical attack damage based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.  Poor Man's Shield will always block attacks from enemy Heroes, but has a 53% chance to block damage from creeps.
itemdata.notes: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 6 Agility
MELEE DAMAGE BLOCK: 20
RANGED DAMAGE BLOCK: 10
CREEP BLOCK CHANCE: 53%
itemdata.lore: A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.

itemdata.attrib:
+ 6 Strength
+ 3 Agility
+ 3 Intelligence
+ 3 Damage
itemdata.lore: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.

itemdata.attrib:
+ 3 Strength
+ 6 Agility
+ 3 Intelligence
+ 3 Damage
itemdata.lore: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.

itemdata.attrib:
+ 3 Strength
+ 3 Agility
+ 6 Intelligence
+ 3 Damage
itemdata.lore: A small gemstone attached to several chains.

itemdata.desc:
Active: Restore - Heals 250 health and gives +2 armor to allied units in a 900 radius.
Passive: Mekansm Aura - Grants 4 health regeneration to allied units in a 900 radius.

Multiple instances of Mekansm Aura do not stack.
itemdata.notes: Restore does not affect units that have been affected by Restore in the last 25 seconds.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 5 All Attributes
+ 5 Armor
AURA HEALTH REGEN: 4
RESTORE HEAL: 250
RESTORE ARMOR: 2
RESTORE ARMOR DURATION: 25
AURA/RESTORE RADIUS: 900
itemdata.lore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.

itemdata.desc:
Passive: Vladmir's Aura - Grants lifesteal, health regeneration, mana regeneration, bonus attack damage, and armor to allies in a 900 radius.  The lifesteal percentage is based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

Multiple instances of Vladmir's Aura do not stack.
itemdata.notes: Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius, Ring of Aquila, or Vladmir's Offering.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 2 All Attributes
AURA HEALTH REGEN: 3
AURA MANA REGEN: 0.8
AURA BONUS ARMOR: 5
AURA BONUS ATTACK DAMAGE: 15%
AURA MELEE LIFESTEAL: 15%
AURA RANGED LIFESTEAL: 10%
AURA RADIUS: 900
itemdata.lore: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.

itemdata.desc:
Upgrades your team's Animal Courier to a Flying Courier, granting it swift, unobstructed movement to carry items to and from your team's base.

Requires a deployed Animal Courier.
Active: Armor Bonus - Gives +2 armor to all allied units in a 900 radius.  Lasts 25 seconds on heroes, 30 seconds on units.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 5 Armor
+ 2 All Attributes
ARMOR CAST RADIUS: 900
itemdata.lore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.

itemdata.desc:
Passive: Basilius Aura - Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 area of effect.
Active: Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units.

Multiple instances of Basilius Aura do not stack.
itemdata.notes: Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius, Ring of Aquila, or Vladmir's Offering.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 6 Damage
+ 1 Armor
AURA MANA REGEN: 0.65
AURA BONUS ARMOR: 2
itemdata.lore: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.

itemdata.desc:
Active: Barrier - Gives a shield that blocks 400 spell damage to all allies in a 900 radius.
Passive: Insight Aura - Gives allied units 4 health regeneration and 10% magic resistance in a 900 radius. The aura's bonus magic resistance is not applied to the equipped hero.
itemdata.notes: Barrier does not affect units that have been affected by Barrier in the last 50 seconds.Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 9 HP Regeneration
+ 30% Spell Resistance
AURA HEALTH REGEN: 4
AURA MAGIC RESISTANCE: 10%
AURA RADIUS: 900
BARRIER SPELL BLOCK: 400
BARRIER DURATION: 12.000000
BARRIER CAST RADIUS: 900
itemdata.lore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.

itemdata.desc:
Active: Soul Release - Heals health over time to friendly units, but deals pure damage over time to enemy units.  The healing effect is lost if the affected ally takes damage from an enemy hero or tower.
Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units.  Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.
itemdata.notes: Empty urns gain 2 charges.If used on a hero with Soul Release already active on them, it will refresh its duration.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 50% Mana Regeneration
+ 6 Strength
RELEASE ALLY TOTAL HEAL: 400
RELEASE ENEMY TOTAL DAMAGE: 150
SOUL RELEASE DURATION: 8
SOUL RELEASE CAST RANGE: 950
itemdata.lore: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.

itemdata.desc:
Passive: Regeneration Aura - Restores health to allies in a 900 unit radius.

Multiple instances of Regeneration Aura do not stack.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 2 All Attributes
AURA HEALTH REGEN: 3
AURA REGEN RADIUS: 900
itemdata.lore: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.

itemdata.desc: Active: Hex - Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. Instantly destroys illusions.
itemdata.notes: The target will have a base movement speed of 140, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 10 Strength
+ 10 Agility
+ 35 Intelligence
+ 150% Mana Regeneration
HEX DURATION: 3.5
itemdata.lore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.

itemdata.desc: Active: Soul Burn - Silences the target unit for 5.0 seconds and amplifies the damage it takes by 30.0%.
itemdata.notes: Amplified damage is dealt at the end of the duration as magical damage.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 25 Intelligence
+ 30 Attack Speed
+ 30 Damage
+ 150% Mana Regeneration
SOUL BURN INCREASED DAMAGE: 30%
SOUL BURN DURATION: 5
itemdata.lore: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.

itemdata.desc: Active: Cyclone - Sweeps a target unit up into cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can be cast on yourself. Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.
itemdata.notes: You cannot cyclone allies.Cyclones cast on yourself go through spell immunity.Cyclone can purge some buffs and debuffs.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 10 Intelligence
+ 150% Mana Regeneration
+ 40 Movement Speed
CYCLONE DURATION: 2.5
itemdata.lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.

itemdata.desc: Active: Force - Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing.  Double click to instantly cast Force on yourself.
itemdata.notes: Self-cast will cause you to use Force on yourself.Force Staff doesn't interrupt the target's actions.Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 10 Intelligence
+ 4 HP Regeneration
itemdata.lore: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.

+ 10 All Attributes

itemdata.lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

itemdata.desc: Active: Reset Cooldowns - Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 10 HP Regeneration
+ 250% Mana Regeneration
+ 20 Damage
itemdata.lore: A powerful artifact created for wizards.

itemdata.desc:
Passive: Assault Aura - Grants attack speed and armor to nearby allied units, and decreases the armor of nearby enemies.

Multiple instances of Assault Aura do not stack.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 35 Attack Speed
+ 10 Armor
AURA ATTACK SPEED: 20
AURA ALLY BONUS ARMOR: 5
AURA ENEMY ARMOR REDUCTION: 5
itemdata.lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

itemdata.desc: Passive: Health Regeneration - Restores a percentage of max health per second. If damage is taken from an enemy hero or Roshan, this ability is disabled for 5 seconds for melee heroes, or 7 seconds for ranged heroes.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 40 Strength
+ 300 Health
HEALTH RESTORED PER SECOND: 3.25%
itemdata.lore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.

itemdata.desc: Active: Avatar - Grants Spell Immunity and 100% Magic Damage Resistance.  Duration and cooldown decrease with each use.  Some abilities are able to disable through Avatar.
itemdata.notes: Purchasing another Black King Bar will not reset its immunity duration.Using Black King Bar may remove some positive buffs.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 10 Strength
+ 24 Damage
AVATAR DURATION: 10/9/8/7/6/5
itemdata.lore: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.

itemdata.desc: Passive: Reincarnation - Brings you to life with full health and mana 5.0 seconds after you die, at the location where you died. Reincarnation must be used within 5 minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears. If it expires, it will heal you over 5 seconds (dispels on damage).
itemdata.lore: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.

itemdata.desc:
Active: Arctic Blast - Emits a freezing wave that deals 200 magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by -40% for 4.0 seconds.
Passive: Freezing Aura - Reduces the attack speed of all enemies in a 900 radius.

Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.
itemdata.notes: The wave extends at a speed of 350 to a max size of 900.The Arctic Blast follows its caster.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 30 Intelligence
+ 15 Armor
AURA ATTACK SLOW: 45
BLAST DAMAGE: 200
BLAST MOVEMENT SLOW: 40%
BLAST SLOW DURATION: 4
BLAST RADIUS: 900
itemdata.lore: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.

itemdata.desc:
Active: Pocket Deny - Instantly causes you to die.

Passive: Bloodpact - Begins with 8 charges, and gains a charge each time an enemy hero dies within 1675 range. Each charge grants 1 mana regeneration per second, reduces the gold lost from death by 25, and reduces respawn time by 4 seconds. If the bearer dies, 500 + 30 health per charge is restored to all allies within a 1675 radius, while the Bloodstone loses a third of its charges. A bloodmark is then placed where the bearer died, granting vision over a 1800 radius and allowing the bearer to gain nearby experience while dead.
itemdata.notes: Only the first Bloodstone will gain charges.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 500 Health
+ 400 Mana
+ 9 HP Regeneration
+ 200% Mana Regeneration
itemdata.lore: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.

itemdata.desc:
Passive: Spellblock - Blocks most targeted spells once every 16.0 seconds.
Active: Transfer Spellblock - Temporarily removes Spellblock from the item's owner and transfers it to an allied unit.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 15 All Attributes
+ 6 HP Regeneration
+ 150% Mana Regeneration
+ 10 Damage
itemdata.lore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.

itemdata.desc: Active: Echo Shell - Applies a shield to the target unit which re-casts most targeted spells back to their caster. The shielded unit will still take damage from the spell. Dispels negative buffs when applied.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 10 Damage
+ 10 Armor
+ 5 HP Regeneration
+ 125% Mana Regeneration
ECHO DURATION: 6
ECHO CAST RANGE: 900
itemdata.lore: The jewel at its center still reflects a pale image of its creator.

itemdata.desc: Passive: Damage Block - Gives the wielder a chance to block damage from each incoming attack based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
itemdata.notes: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 250 Health
+ 6 HP Regeneration
BLOCK CHANCE: 75%
BLOCK DAMAGE MELEE: 40
BLOCK DAMAGE RANGED: 20
itemdata.lore: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.

itemdata.desc:
Active: Guard - Grant nearby allied heroes a 100% chance to block 55 damage from each incoming attack, along with 2 armor. Lasts 10 seconds.
Passive: Damage Block - Gives the wearer a chance to block damage from each incoming attack based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
itemdata.notes: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.Guard does not affect units that have been affected by Guard in the last 70 seconds.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 250 Health
+ 6 HP Regeneration
+ 2 All Attributes
+ 5 Armor
BLOCK CHANCE: 75%
BLOCK DAMAGE MELEE: 40
BLOCK DAMAGE RANGED: 20
GUARD ARMOR: 2
GUARD DURATION: 10
GUARD RADIUS: 900
GUARD DAMAGE BLOCK : 55
itemdata.lore: A cuirass originally built to protect against the dreaded Year Beast.

itemdata.desc: Active: Damage Return - Reflects any damage taken back to the unit that dealt the damage.  Lasts 4.5 seconds.
itemdata.notes: Damage Return is calculated after reductions.Damage Return doesn't reflect damage from other forms of Blademail.Returned damage is pure, and does not pierce spell immunity.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 22 Damage
+ 6 Armor
+ 10 Intelligence
DAMAGE RETURN DURATION: 4.5
itemdata.lore: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.

itemdata.attrib:
+ 450 Health
+ 400 Mana
+ 4 HP Regeneration
+ 100% Mana Regeneration
itemdata.lore: Regain lost courage.

itemdata.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 9 HP Regeneration
+ 30% Spell Resistance
itemdata.lore: A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.

itemdata.desc: Drops on death.  Becomes unusable if picked up by an ally of its owner until it is returned to its owner. It is immediately usable by anybody if an enemy of the owner picks it up. A dropped Rapier cannot be picked up by a courier.
itemdata.notes: If Divine Rapier is dropped and picked up by an enemy of its original owner, it cannot be dropped again except by death.
itemdata.attrib: + 330 Damage
itemdata.lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.

itemdata.desc:
Passive: Mini-Bash - Grants each attack a chance to deal bonus damage and deal a mini-stun.
Passive: True Strike - Prevents your attacks from missing. True Strike does not work when attacking enemy structures.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 88 Damage
+ 15 Attack Speed
MINI-BASH CHANCE: 35%
MINI-BASH DAMAGE: 100
itemdata.lore: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.

itemdata.desc: Active: Toggle Burn - When active, scorches nearby enemies for 50 damage per second and blinds them, causing them to miss 17% of their attacks.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 65 Damage
BURN DAMAGE PER SECOND: 50
BURN MISS CHANCE: 17%
BURN RADIUS: 700
itemdata.lore: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.

itemdata.desc:
Active: Flutter - Trade evasion for 25% additional movement speed for 6.0 seconds.

Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 30 Agility
+ 30 Damage
+ 35% Evasion
+ 30 Attack Speed
FLUTTER BONUS MOVE SPEED: 25%
FLUTTER DURATION: 6
itemdata.lore: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.

itemdata.desc: Passive: Critical Strike - Grants each attack a chance to deal additional damage. Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 81 Damage
CRITICAL CHANCE: 25%
CRITICAL DAMAGE: 240%
itemdata.lore: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.

itemdata.desc: Passive: Bash - Grants each attack a chance to stun the target for 1.4 seconds and deal 60 bonus damage, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.
itemdata.notes: Does not stack with other sources of Bash, however it will stack with Mini-Bash (e.g. Monkey King Bar).The following heroes cannot trigger Bash on this item: Spirit Breaker, Faceless Void, Slardar, and Troll Warlord.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 25 Damage
+ 8 Strength
BASH MELEE CHANCE: 25%
BASH RANGED CHANCE: 10%
BASH STUN DURATION: 1.4
BASH BONUS DAMAGE: 60
itemdata.lore: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.

itemdata.desc:
Active: Chop Tree/Ward - Destroy a target tree or ward. Chop cast range is increased when targetting wards.
Passive: Quell - Increases attack damage against non-hero units, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee. Does not provide bonus damage against Roshan.
Passive: Cleave - Deals a percent of attack damage in a 280 area around the target. Ranged units cannot Cleave.
itemdata.notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.If multiple sources of Cleave are present, each Cleave's damage is applied separately.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 55 Damage
+ 6 HP Regeneration
+ 150% Mana Regeneration
CLEAVE DAMAGE: 35%
QUELL MELEE DAMAGE: 160%
QUELL RANGED DAMAGE: 125%
CHOP TREE CAST RANGE: 350
CHOP WARD CAST RANGE: 450
itemdata.lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.

itemdata.desc:
Active: Mirror Image - Creates 2 images of your hero that last 20 seconds. Melee heroes have a 35.0 second cooldown on this ability, while for Ranged heroes the cooldown is 50 seconds.

Melee images deal 33% damage and take 350% damage, while Ranged images deal 28% and take 400% damage.

Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
itemdata.notes: Has a 0.1 second cast time during which you are invulnerable.Many effects are removed upon using Manta.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 10 Strength
+ 26 Agility
+ 10 Intelligence
+ 15 Attack Speed
+ 10% Movement Speed
NUMBER OF IMAGES: 2
IMAGE DURATION: 20
MELEE IMAGE DAMAGE: 33%
MELEE IMAGE DAMAGE TAKEN: 350%
RANGED IMAGE DAMAGE: 28%
RANGED IMAGE DAMAGE TAKEN: 400%
itemdata.lore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.

itemdata.desc: Passive: Critical Strike - Grants each attack a chance to deal additional damage. Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 30 Damage
CRITICAL CHANCE: 20%
CRITICAL DAMAGE: 175%
itemdata.lore: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.

itemdata.desc: Active: Toggle Unholy Strength - When active, Unholy Strength grants +31 damage and +25 strength, but drains 40 health per second.  You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated.
itemdata.notes: The strength change will affect both maximum and current HP, but you cannot die from the change.The strength change occurs over 0.6 seconds.Activating or deactiving Unholy Strength does not interrupt channeling.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 9 Damage
+ 25 Attack Speed
+ 5 Armor
+ 7 HP Regeneration
itemdata.lore: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.

itemdata.desc: Active: Shadow Walk - Makes you invisible until the duration ends, or until you attack or cast a spell.  While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20% faster and can move through units.  If attacking to end the invisibility, you gain 175 bonus damage on that attack.  Lasts 14.0 seconds.
itemdata.notes: Has a 0.3 second fade time.If the invisibility ends without attacking, the bonus damage is lost.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 22 Damage
+ 30 Attack Speed
SHADOW WALK DURATION: 14
SHADOW WALK DAMAGE: 175
itemdata.lore: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.

itemdata.desc:
Active: Shadow Walk - Makes you invisible until the duration ends, or until you attack or cast a spell.  While invisible, you move 20% faster and can move through units.  Attacking to end the invisibility will deal 225 bonus damage to the target, disable their passive abilities, and reduce their damage output.
Passive: Lesser Maim - Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 4.0 seconds.
itemdata.notes: Backstab cannot miss.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 32 Damage
+ 30 Attack Speed
+ 16 Strength
MAIM CHANCE: 15%
MAIM MOVE SLOW: 20%
MAIM ATTACK SLOW: 20
MAIM DURATION: 4
SHADOW WALK DURATION: 14
BONUS ATTACK DAMAGE: 225
ENEMY DAMAGE REDUCTION: 40%
REDUCTION DURATION: 5
itemdata.lore: Once used to slay an unjust king, only to have the kingdom erupt into civil war in the aftermath.

itemdata.desc:
Passive: Greater Maim - Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 5.0 seconds.

Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 16 Damage
+ 16 Strength
+ 16 Agility
+ 16 Attack Speed
+ 16% Movement Speed
MAIM CHANCE: 16%
MAIM MOVEMENT SLOW: 32%
MAIM ATTACK SLOW: 32
MAIM DURATION: 5
itemdata.lore: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.

itemdata.desc:
Active: Unholy Rage - Increases Lifesteal percentage to 200% for 4.0 seconds.
Passive: Lifesteal - Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.

Satanic is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifier.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 20 Damage
+ 25 Strength
+ 5 Armor
LIFESTEAL: 25%
UNHOLY RAGE LIFESTEAL: 200%
UNHOLY RAGE DURATION: 4
itemdata.lore: Immense power at the cost of your soul.

itemdata.desc:
Active: Static Charge - Places a charged shield on a target unit which has a 20% chance to release a shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and 4 additional enemies.
Passive: Chain Lightning - Grants a chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 8 targets, dealing 150 magical damage to each.

Mjollnir is a Unique Attack Modifier that stacks with other Unique Attack Modifiers, but overrides them when Chain Lightning occurs.
itemdata.notes: Static Charge cannot trigger more than once per second.Static Charge's shock deals magical damage centered on hero with the Static Charge. Static Charge's targets cannot be more than 900 range away.Static Charge procs will not bounce to heroes that are invisible or hidden by Fog of War.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 24 Damage
+ 80 Attack Speed
STATIC DURATION: 15
STATIC CHANCE: 20%
STATIC DAMAGE: 200
STATIC RELEASE RADIUS: 900
CHAIN CHANCE: 25%
CHAIN DAMAGE: 150
CHAIN TARGETS: 8
CHAIN LEAP RADIUS: 900
itemdata.lore: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.

itemdata.desc:
Passive: Cold Attack - Each attack slows the movement and attack speed of the target. The duration of the slow is based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

Eye of Skadi is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.  Eye of Skadi can be combined with Lifesteal Attack Modifiers.
itemdata.notes: Lasts 5 seconds with melee Eye of Skadi, 3 seconds with ranged Eye of Skadi.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 25 All Attributes
+ 250 Health
+ 250 Mana
COLD MOVE SLOW: 35%
COLD ATTACK SLOW: 45
COLD MELEE DURATION: 5
COLD RANGED DURATION: 2.5
itemdata.lore: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.

itemdata.desc: Passive: Lesser Maim - Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 4.0 seconds.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 10 Damage
+ 16 Strength
MAIM CHANCE: 15%
MAIM MOVEMENT SLOW: 20%
MAIM ATTACK SLOW: 20
MAIM DURATION: 4
itemdata.lore: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.

itemdata.desc:
Active: Dominate - Take control of a non-hero, non-ancient target unit. Dominated units gain 500 bonus health.
Passive: Lifesteal - Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.

Helm of the Dominator is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
itemdata.notes: Cannot dominate more than one unit at a time.  If a new unit is dominated, the old one will die.Selling or upgrading Helm of the Dominator will cause dominated units to die.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 20 Damage
+ 5 Armor
+ 3 HP Regeneration
LIFESTEAL: 15%
itemdata.lore: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.

itemdata.desc:
Passive: Chain Lightning - Grants a chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 4 targets, dealing 120 magical damage to each.

Maelstrom is a Unique Attack Modifier that stacks with other Unique Attack Modifiers, but overrides them when Chain Lightning occurs.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 24 Damage
+ 25 Attack Speed
CHAIN CHANCE: 25%
CHAIN DAMAGE: 120
CHAIN TARGETS: 4
CHAIN LEAP RADIUS: 900
itemdata.lore: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.

itemdata.desc:
Passive: Corruption - Your attacks reduce target's armor for 15 seconds.

Desolator is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
itemdata.notes: Armor reduction works on buildings.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 50 Damage
ARMOR REDUCTION: 7
itemdata.lore: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.

itemdata.desc: Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 16 Agility
+ 15 Attack Speed
+ 10% Movement Speed
itemdata.lore: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.

itemdata.desc:
Active: Berserk - Gives 100 attack speed and 17% movement speed, but causes you to take extra 30% damage.  Lasts 12.0 seconds.
Passive: Lifesteal - Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.

Mask of Madness is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
itemdata.attrib:
LIFESTEAL: 20%
BERSERK ATTACK SPEED: 100
BERSERK MOVE SPEED: 17%
BERSERK ADDED DAMAGE TAKEN: 30%
BERSERK DURATION: 12
itemdata.lore: Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.

itemdata.desc:
Active: Purge - If cast on an enemy, removes buffs from the target and slows it for 4.0 seconds. Instantly kills enemy summoned units and illusions. If cast on an ally, Purge removes most debuffs.
Passive: Manabreak - Each attack burns 25 mana from the target, and deals the same amount in physical damage. Burns 12 mana per attack from ranged illusions. Does not stack with other manabreak abilities.

Upgradable.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 20/35 Agility
+ 6/10 Intelligence
PURGE SLOW DURATION: 4
PURGE CAST RANGE: 600
itemdata.lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.

itemdata.desc:
Active: Purge - If cast on an enemy, removes buffs from the target and slows it for 4.0 seconds. Instantly kills enemy summoned units and illusions. If cast on an ally, Purge removes most debuffs.
Passive: Manabreak - Each attack burns 25 mana from the target, and deals the same amount in physical damage. Burns 12 mana per attack from ranged illusions. Does not stack with other manabreak abilities.

Upgradable.

+ 20/35 Agility

itemdata.desc:
Active: Ether Blast - Launches a projectile which converts the target to ethereal form, increasing any incoming magic damage they take, while rendering them immune to physical damage and unable to attack.  Can be cast on self.  If the target is an enemy, it is also slowed, and takes 2.0x your primary attribute + 75 as magical damage.
Using a Town Portal Scroll or Boots of Travel will not dispel Ethereal Form.
itemdata.notes: Shares cooldown with Ghost Scepter.Ethereal units take 40% bonus magic damage.Lasts an extra second on Self or Allied cast.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 40 Agility
+ 10 Strength
+ 10 Intelligence
BLAST ENEMY MOVE SLOW: 80%
BLAST ENEMY DURATION: 3
BLAST ALLY/SELF DURATION: 4
INCREASED MAGIC DAMAGE: 40%
itemdata.lore: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.

itemdata.desc: Active: Sacrifice - Consume 150 health to temporarily gain 150 mana.  Lasts 10 seconds.
itemdata.notes: If the mana gain cannot fit in your mana pool, it creates a buffer of mana that will be used before your mana pool.  If this mana is not used before the duration ends, the extra mana is lost.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 3 HP Regeneration
+ 50% Mana Regeneration
SACRIFICE DURATION: 10
itemdata.lore: A ring that feeds on the souls of those who wear it.

itemdata.desc:
Active: Replenish Mana - Restores mana to all allies in a 900 area around the hero.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
itemdata.notes: Does not work on Meepo clones.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 55 Movement Speed
+ 250 Mana
REPLENISH MANA RESTORE: 135
REPLENISH CAST RADIUS: 900
itemdata.lore: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.

itemdata.desc:
Passive: Cooldown Reduction - Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 25%.
Passive: Spell Lifesteal - A percentage of damage caused by spells is returned to the caster as health.

itemdata.desc:
Passive: Poison Attack - Poisons the target, dealing damage over time and slowing movement based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

Orb of Venom is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.  Orb of Venom can be combined with Lifesteal Attack Modifiers.

Passive: Swiftness Aura - Gives bonus attack and movement speed to allies in a 900 radius.

MAIM ATTACK SLOW: 20
MAIM DURATION: 4
DISARM RANGED DURATION: 4.5
DISARM MELEE DURATION: 3
DISARM CAST RANGE: 600
itemdata.lore: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.

itemdata.desc:
Passive: Aquila Aura - Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 area of effect.
Active: Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units.

Multiple instances of Aquila Aura do not stack.
itemdata.notes: Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius, Ring of Aquila, or Vladmir's Offering.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 9 Damage
+ 3 Strength
+ 9 Agility
+ 3 Intelligence
+ 1 Armor
AURA MANA REGEN: 0.65
AURA BONUS ARMOR: 2
itemdata.lore: The ring of the fallen Warlord Aquila continues to support armies in battle.

itemdata.desc: Passive: Break - Whenever you attack or are attacked, the health regeneration and 30 Movement Speed are lost for 13 seconds.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 90 Movement Speed
+ 4 Armor
+ 12 HP Regeneration
itemdata.lore: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.

itemdata.desc: Active: Fade - Grants invisibility to you or a target allied hero after a 1.5 second fade time. Moving breaks the invisibility. There is no cooldown when using this item on yourself.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 20 Attack Speed
FADE TIME: 1.5

itemdata.desc: Active: Glimmer - After a 0.4 second delay, grants invisibility and 55% magic resistance to you or a target allied unit. Can be cast while channelling.
itemdata.attrib:
+ 20 Attack Speed
+ 20% Spell Resistance
GLIMMER FADE TIME: 0.4
GLIMMER MAGIC RESISTANCE: 55%
GLIMMER DURATION: 5
itemdata.lore: The stolen cape of a master illusionist.

itemdata.desc: Use: Deposit the candy in your bucket to give all heroes on the map gold and XP, or use it to satisfy a rampaging Roshan's sweet tooth. Get the highest candy in your bucket to win a prize! Carrying candy makes you less healthy, and decreases your max HP.
itemdata.lore: A strange looking candy, made out of Greevil cream and gummy vitamins.

itemdata.desc: Use the Greevil Whistle to temporarily transform into your Greevil!
Use the Greevil Whistle to toggle between Greevil and Hero!
Use: Open Stocking to receive your gifts!
Gives a massive increase of 100 to movespeed. Increases control on the ice. Use short paths for the best result!
Use the cake to heal 400 health and 50 mana over 8 seconds
Use the cookie to heal 350 health and 100 mana over 11 seconds
Use the cocoa to heal 300 health and 150 mana over 14 seconds
Use the ham to heal 300 health and 75 mana over 2 seconds
Use the kringle to heal 250 health and 200 mana over 17 seconds
Refreshes all the Greevil's abilities.
Makes your greevil move at max speed for 10 seconds.
itemdata.lore: There is nothing faster than a greevil eating his favorite treat!

itemdata.desc: Use the chow to heal your greevil 400 health and 150 mana over 5 seconds.
After channeling for 2 seconds the greevil pops to the new location.
